pod_URL.description: URL for posting the data from the queue after data mapping.

data_mapping.title: Data Mapping
data_mapping.description: Data Mapping of the fields from the Source Connector to the Pod Schema as a json object

webhook_URL.title: Webhook URL
webhook_URL.description: Webhook URL to be passed to the Pod, which receives notification about the job status

bearer_token.title: Bearer token
bearer_token.description: Bearer token for authorization with pod

node_id.title: Node Id
node_id.description: Node Id of the Data Source Node in the Workflow

required_fields.title: Required Fields
required_fields.description: List of fields that are required in the Object for indexing. * for all fields
